title: Shopee → Amazon Auto-Purchase & Shipping
globalNote: Before activating this feature, make sure to update the "Sales/Order Export" function after enabling "Product Management." This is required for the feature to work correctly.
errorFileDesc: Click “Open” to view a file listing items that were not automatically shipped and their details. Items filtered out by conditions are included as error items. Out-of-stock or unpurchasable items are also treated as errors.
autoOrderingDesc: When an order is placed in your Shopee shop, this feature will add the corresponding Amazon product to the cart and ship it to your configured address. Only products meeting your Expected Profit Amount and Shipping Duration will be auto-shipped. Due to Amazon specification changes, unexpected issues may occur. Use at your own responsibility.
ordersDesc: Recent Shopee orders with decisions and Amazon results.
dryRunDesc: Evaluate eligibility but skip purchasing on Amazon
queueUnavailable: Queue metrics are unavailable. Refresh to try again.
testScrapeDesc: Queue a real Amazon product URL to validate your connector.
mappingsDesc: Link Shopee products to Amazon products
reviewBandDesc: If profit is within this % of the minimum, send to manual review instead of auto-reject
shopOverridesDesc: Customize rules per shop if needed
reviewDesc: Orders held for manual review (profit band or other flags).
featureAutoBuy: Playwright adds to cart and checks out with your configured label.
featureProfit: Profit + shipping-day filters, points/domestic shipping, dry-run mode.
featureOps: CSV exports, decision logs, connector health, manual sync, alerts.
faqA1: No. All ordering is via headless Playwright automation.
faqA2: Errors are logged, visible in the Errors page, and downloadable as CSV.
faqA3: Yes, enable dry-run mode in Settings.
faqA4: Sign up, connect Shopee and Amazon, set rules, activate, and monitor the dashboard.
signupDesc: Create your account to start auto-shipping.
onboardingDesc: Complete these steps to activate auto-shipping.
opsDesc: Monitor queue health, test scrapes, and review connector status.
opsHeroFooter: Realtime queue data refreshes every 60 seconds.
opsGuardrailWorkflows: Pause syncs if failed jobs spike above 50.
opsGuardrailEscalate: Escalate to engineering if heartbeat fails twice.
opsGuardrailDocs: Log every manual test in your on-call doc.
mappingsDescFull: Link Shopee products to Amazon products with priority order.
mappingFormSubtitle: Link Shopee items to their Amazon product URLs.
mappingTableSubtitle: Search, filter, and verify mapping status.
noMappingsDesc: Create your first mapping to route Shopee orders to the correct Amazon listing.
instrNote: Before turning on auto-shipping, refresh Shopee “Sales/Order Export” after enabling “Product Management” to keep data in sync.
instr1: When Shopee gets an order, we add the mapped Amazon item to cart and ship to your saved address if it meets profit and shipping rules. Use at your own risk—Amazon updates can cause surprises.
instr2: “Open” downloads a CSV of items we did not auto-ship (filtered-out, out-of-stock, or unpurchasable).
instr3: Optionally include Amazon Points in profit math.
instr5: Set the maximum shipping days allowed.
instr6: Set the minimum expected profit (negative allowed, e.g., -2000).
instr7: Only orders from selected shops are eligible.
instr8: Save, activate auto-shipping, and monitor the dashboard.
instrNote2: Orders are placed via headless Playwright browser; no Amazon API is used.
onboardingStep4: Set rules (profit/shipping-days, points, domestic shipping, dry-run)
pricingHeroSubtitle: Optimize markups, guardrails, and targeting rules in one place.
pricingHeroFooter: Rules run sequentially. Higher priority executes first.
pricingSampleDataNotice: Showing mock pricing rules until your API delivers live data.
pricingRuleFormSubtitle: Stack conditions to automate markups and guardrails.
pricingRuleTypeFixedDesc: Add a fixed yen amount to selected products.
pricingRuleTypeDynamicDesc: Blend signals with AI powered repricing.
pricingRuleTypeHint: Choose how pricing should be recalculated
pricingRuleCategoriesHint: Comma separated labels help teammates filter
pricingRuleListSubtitle: Toggle or adjust automations at any time.
pricingRuleEmpty: No rules yet. Create your first strategy on the left.
pricingRuleEmptyDescription: Create your first automation to keep prices on target.
pricingRuleSearchPlaceholder: Search rules by name, category, or type
pricingTipCategories: Tag rules with categories so teams know scope.
pricingTipCompetitors: Pair competitor-match rules with a safety margin.
pricingTipSchedule: Use schedule labels to document when automations fire.
adminUsersDesc: Manage accounts, activation, and password resets.
onboardingModalStep1Desc: Connect Shopee + Amazon, set profit/shipping rules, and monitor everything from Dashboard/Errors/Review.
onboardingModalStep2Desc: Add Partner ID/Key/Token and select your shop so we can read orders.
onboardingModalStep3Desc: Save Amazon credentials (encrypted) so Playwright can check out on your behalf.
onboardingModalStep4Desc: Define profit thresholds, shipping days, and include/exclude points or domestic shipping.
onboardingModalStep5Desc: Turn on auto-shipping, then watch Dashboard, Errors, and Manual Review for activity.
onboardingModalWelcomeBlurb: We’ll guide you through connecting Shopee, saving Amazon login, and setting basic rules. You can adjust everything later in Settings.
onboardingModalCompleteDesc: Nice work. Auto-ship is ready—check Dashboard, Errors, and Manual Review to monitor activity.
dashboardHeroSubtitle: Monitor fulfillment, revenue, and system health in one place.
keepSuccessRateHigh: Keep success rate above 90% before enabling auto-fulfillment.
dailyHealthCheck: Run the automation health check every morning.
triageErrorsQuickly: Triage failed orders within 2 hours to avoid backlog.
checkConnection: Unable to connect to backend services. Please check your connection.

keepSuccessRateHigh: Keep success rate above 90% before enabling auto-fulfillment.
dailyHealthCheck: Run the automation health check every morning.
triageErrorsQuickly: Triage failed orders within 2 hours to avoid backlog.

inventoryInGoodShape: Your inventory is in good shape.

fillRequiredFields: Please fill in the required fields
unableToFetchInventoryData: Unable to fetch inventory data. Please retry shortly.

crmHeroDescription: Build relationships, track loyalty, and maximize customer lifetime value.
crmHeroFooter: Sync customer health daily to keep loyalty automation accurate.
crmPlaybookRetention: Launch win-back campaign for dormant customers.
crmPlaybookLoyalty: Upgrade loyal buyers to the next tier automatically.
crmConnectShopPrompt: Connect a shop to load data
crmConnectShopDescription: Enter your Shop ID above to load CRM data.
crmInteractionFieldsRequired: Please fill in all required fields
analyticsSampleDataDesc: Showing sample analytics while we reconnect to your live data.
analyticsLiveDataHint: Data refreshes every 15 minutes from the analytics API.
unableToFetchAnalytics: We couldn’t fetch analytics data. Please retry soon.
analyticsHeroDesc: Track performance, monitor trends, and optimize your operations.
notificationsDesc: Manage notification channels, rules, and view delivery history
notificationsHeroSubtitle: Multi-channel alerts, automation rules, and delivery tracking
notificationsHeroFooter: Provide a shop ID to synchronize rules and delivery logs.
notificationsProvideShop: Enter a Shop ID to load channels, rules, and delivery history.
notificationsTipDedupe: Deduplicate alerts per channel to avoid spam.
notificationsTipPriority: Reserve critical priority for blocking events.
notificationsTipTesting: Test channels weekly to verify credentials.
channelConfigHint: Channel configuration can be set after creation
subject: Subject
enterShopIdDesc: Enter your Shop ID above to view
enterShopIdFirst: Enter a Shop ID to load data
welcomeTourStep1Description: Monitor your orders, sales, and automation status in real-time from this central hub.
welcomeTourStep2Description: View detailed charts and metrics to track your business performance.
welcomeTourStep3Description: Keep track of stock levels, low stock alerts, and product movements.
welcomeTourStep4Description: Manage customer relationships, loyalty tiers, and interaction history.
welcomeTourStep5Description: View and manage all your orders with automated Amazon fulfillment.
welcomeTourStep6Description: Configure multi-channel notifications and automation rules.
welcomeTourStep7Description: Customize your automation rules, credentials, and preferences.
welcomeTourStep8Description: Explore the platform and let automation handle your dropshipping business!
tourCompleteMessage: You've completed the tour. You can restart it anytime by clicking the help button.
analyticsStep1Description: Get insights into your business performance with interactive charts and metrics.
analyticsStep2Description: Monitor weekly revenue, orders, profit, and conversion rates at a glance.
analyticsStep3Description: View data for different time periods: 7, 30, or 90 days.
analyticsStep4Description: Interactive charts showing revenue and profit trends over time.
analyticsStep5Description: Track daily order volumes with visual bar charts.
analyticsStep6Description: Get data-driven recommendations to improve your business.
inventoryStep1Description: Manage your product inventory, stock levels, and alerts.
inventoryStep2Description: Overview of total stock, low stock items, and out of stock products.
inventoryStep3Description: Click here to add new products to your inventory.
inventoryStep4Description: Find products quickly by name, SKU, or status.
inventoryStep5Description: View all products with current stock levels and locations.
inventoryStep6Description: Monitor low stock alerts and acknowledge them when restocked.
crmStep1Description: Build lasting relationships with your customers.
crmStep2Description: See total customers, average lifetime value, and loyalty distribution.
crmStep3Description: Track customer loyalty across Bronze, Silver, Gold, and Platinum tiers.
crmStep4Description: Find customers by name, email, or filter by loyalty tier.
crmStep5Description: Click any customer to view detailed profile, interactions, and loyalty history.
crmStep6Description: Track customer interactions including purchases, support, and complaints.
ordersStep1Description: View and manage all your Shopee orders and Amazon fulfillment.
ordersStep2Description: Monitor total orders, successful fulfillments, pending, and failed orders.
ordersStep3Description: See if automation is active and current configuration.
ordersStep4Description: Filter orders by status: All, Processed, Pending, or Error.
ordersStep5Description: Retry failed orders or view detailed order information.
ordersStep6Description: Select multiple orders to retry or export in bulk.
settingsStep1Description: Configure your automation rules and credentials.
settingsStep2Description: Connect your Shopee shop with Partner ID, Key, and Token.
settingsStep3Description: Securely store your Amazon login credentials (encrypted).
settingsStep4Description: Set profit thresholds, shipping days, and other conditions.
settingsStep5Description: Choose which shops to enable for automation.
settingsStep6Description: Save your settings and activate automation when ready.
getStartedMessage: Get started by adding your first item
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
featureAnalyticsDesc: Track performance with real-time insights and forecasting
featureInventoryDesc: Monitor stock levels and automate reordering
featureCRMDesc: Build customer relationships with loyalty tiers
featureNotificationsDesc: Email, SMS, Slack, Discord, and Webhook alerts
featurePricingDesc: Automated pricing strategies with competitor matching
profitCalculatorSubtitle: Calculate expected profit margins for Shopee to Amazon orders
profitCalculatorEmptyDescription: Fill out the Shopee and Amazon inputs, then run the simulator to see projected profit.
automationTipMargin: Keep profit margin above 10% before scheduling auto-fulfillment.
automationTipShipping: Apply domestic shipping only when it exceeds ¥400 to avoid noise.
automationTipPoints: Leverage Amazon points for high-volume SKUs to offset fees.
scenarioAdjustInputs: Adjust inputs or guardrails before handing off to automation.
automationReadyBody: You can safely queue this order for automatic fulfillment.
manualReviewBody: Tweak inputs or guardrails before scheduling automation.
operatorNotesBody: Capture why you overrode certain costs before handing off to teammates. Keeping a short log improves auditability and keeps the automation guardrails trustworthy.
fillFormToCalculate: Fill out the form and click Calculate to see profit analysis
amazonScraperSubtitle: Extract product information from Amazon Japan
mustBeValidAmazonURL: Must be a valid amazon.co.jp URL
pleaseEnterValidAmazonURL: Please enter a valid Amazon Japan URL
quickTip2: Make sure the product is available and in stock
quickTip3: The scraper extracts price, shipping, tax, and points
quickTip4: Copy data to Calculator for profit analysis
quickTip5: Remove tracking parameters to keep URLs stable
quickTip6: Use Copy to Calculator to check profit instantly
enterProductURLAndScrape: Enter a product URL and click Scrape to view results
scraperHeroFooter: Provide a valid Amazon URL to preview pricing and delivery.
fallbackLogicSubtitle: How we guard against missing data
fallbackExplanation: If scraping fails we synthesize price, delivery, and ASIN data so automation can keep running.
fallbackASINNote: ASINs derive from the provided link to preserve traceability.
manageReturns: Manage customer return requests and refunds
interactiveCharts: Interactive charts for the last {{days}} days
analyticsRevenueGrowthPositive: Your weekly revenue is trending positively. Consider scaling your operations.
analyticsRevenueGrowthSteady: Your weekly revenue is trending steadily. Focus on marketing and product optimization.
analyticsConversionPositive: At {{rate}}%, your conversion is excellent. Maintain current strategies.
analyticsConversionImprove: At {{rate}}%, your conversion is steady. Try improving product descriptions and pricing.
analyticsOrderVolumeHigh: {{count}} orders this week. High volume detected - ensure inventory levels are adequate.
analyticsOrderVolumeLow: {{count}} orders this week. Consider promotional campaigns to boost volume.
analyticsStockAlertMessage: {{count}} products need restocking to avoid fulfillment delays.
dataCopied: Data copied! Open Calculator to use it.
copyToCalculator: Copy data to Calculator for profit analysis
enterShopIDPlaceholder: Enter Shop ID to view customer data
whyTierChanged: Why is the tier being changed?
searchByOrderID: Search by Shopee or Amazon order ID...
enterShopIDReturns: Enter Shop ID to view returns
addInternalNotes: Add internal notes about this decision...
enterShopIDNotifications: Enter Shop ID to manage notifications
messageTemplateVariablesHint: Available variables: {{ orderId }}, {{ customerName }}, {{ amount }}, {{ status }}
hintPointsEarn: Points you'll earn from this purchase
hintPartnerID: Find this in your Shopee Open Platform app settings
hintPartnerKey: Keep this secret! Used for signing API requests
hintShopID: Get from your Shopee seller center URL or API
hintAmazonEmail: The email you use to log in to Amazon
descriptionAdjustFilters: Try adjusting your filters or search term
descriptionAddFirstChannel: Add your first notification channel to start sending alerts
descriptionCreateAutomationRules: Create automation rules to send notifications based on events
descriptionReturnRequests: Return requests will appear here when customers initiate returns
